verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> I, <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G3870>urge<s%> you by the <S%G4240>meekness<s%> and <S%G1932>gentleness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> â€“ I <S%G3739>who<s%> am <S%G5011>meek<s%> when <S%G4383>face<s%> to <S%G4383>face<s%> with you, but <S%G2292>bold<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you when <S%G548>absent!<s%>

I <S%G1189>ask<s%> that when I am <S%G3918>present<s%> I may not be <S%G2292>bold<s%> with the <S%G4006>confidence<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3049>propose<s%> to be <S%G5111>courageous<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> who <S%G3049>regard<s%> us as <S%G5613>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
For though we <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> we do not <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

for the <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of our <S%G4752>warfare<s%> are not of the <S%G4559>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2316>divinely<s%> <S%G1415>powerful<s%> for the <S%G2506>destruction<s%> of <S%G3794>fortresses.<s%>

[We are] <S%G2507>destroying<s%> <S%G3053>speculations<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5313>lofty<s%> <S%G5313>thing<s%> <S%G1869>raised<s%> up <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and [we are] <S%G163>taking<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3540>thought<s%> <S%G163>captive<s%> to the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
and we are <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G1556>punish<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3876>disobedience,<s%> <S%G3752>whenever<s%> your <S%G5218>obedience<s%> is <S%G4137>complete.<s%>

You are <S%G991>looking<s%> at things as they are <S%G2596>outwardly.<s%> <S%G4383><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is <S%G3982>confident<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> that he is Christ's, let him <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1909>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> that <S%G2531>just<s%> as he is Christ's, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are we.

For <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I should <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4053>further<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> our <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> for <S%G3619>building<s%> you up and not for <S%G2506>destroying<s%> you, I shall not be <S%G153>put<s%> to <S%G153>shame,<s%>
for I do not wish to <S%G1380>seem<s%> as <S%G302>if<s%> I would <S%G1629>terrify<s%> you by my <S%G1992>letters.<s%>

For they <S%G5346>say,<s%> "His <S%G1992>letters<s%> are <S%G926>weighty<s%> and <S%G2478>strong,<s%> but his <S%G4983>personal<s%> <S%G3952>presence<s%> is <S%G772>unimpressive,<s%> and his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G1848>contemptible.<s%>"

Let <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>person<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G3634>what<s%> we are in <S%G3056>word<s%> by <S%G1992>letters<s%> when <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>persons<s%> [we are] <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> when <S%G3918>present.<s%>

For we are not <S%G5111>bold<s%> to <S%G1469>class<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4793>compare<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> with <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>themselves;<s%> but when they <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> by <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> and <S%G4793>compare<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> they are <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G4920>understanding.<s%>

But we will not <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1519>beyond<s%> <S%G280><s%> [our] <S%G280>measure,<s%> but <S%G2596>within<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2583>sphere<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3307>apportioned<s%> to us as a <S%G3358>measure,<s%> to <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G891>far<s%> as you.

For we are not <S%G5239>overextending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> we did not <S%G2185>reach<s%> to you, for we were the <S%G5348>first<s%> to <S%G5348>come<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G891>far<s%> as you in the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

not <S%G2744>boasting<s%> <S%G1519>beyond<s%> <S%G280><s%> [our] <S%G280>measure,<s%> [that is,] in <S%G245>other<s%> men's <S%G2873>labors,<s%> but with the <S%G1680>hope<s%> that as your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G837>grows,<s%> we shall be, <S%G2596>within<s%> our <S%G2583>sphere,<s%> <S%G3170>enlarged<s%> <S%G1519>even<s%> <S%G4050>more<s%> by you,

<S%G1519>so<s%> as to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> even to the regions <S%G5238>beyond<s%> you, [and] not to <S%G2744>boast<s%> in <S%G2092>what<s%> has been <S%G2092>accomplished<s%> in the <S%G2583>sphere<s%> of <S%G245>another.<s%>
But he who <S%G2744>boasts,<s%> let him <S%G2744>boast<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
For not he who <S%G4921>commends<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> is <S%G1384>approved,<s%> but <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4921>commends.<s%>
